entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as hitting people and pretending to cry. He is also mentioned as being in the car with Harry and Piers on their way to the zoo.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as sitting in the back of the Dursleys' car with Piers and Dudley. He is also mentioned as being unable to believe his luck and having strange things happen around him.

entities.name: piers
entities.description: Piers is described as sitting in the back of the Dursleys' car with Harry and Dudley on their way to the zoo.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is described as taking Harry aside and warning him about any funny business. He also has a large purple face.

entities.name: the dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are described as being unable to think of anything else to do with Harry, but taking him to the zoo instead.

relationships.description: Harry and Dudley are described as sitting in the back of the Dursleys' car together on their way to the zoo.
Uncle Vernon is described as warning Harry about any funny business.
